replies.body:
Hi Eteh!
Happy Birthday!! 
Please don't misunderstand "Ateh".
It is what my mother calls me sometimes..so sorry.
But I got some inspiration from you and Junr #fourletterminecraftusername
Anyways, questions!

1. What is your REAL name?
2. How old are you now?
3. Are you a boy or a girl?
4. Are there any opinions on me?
5. What are your opinions on South Korea and Greece?
6. What is your favorite color?
7. What is your favorite animal?
8. If you could pick any staff member on Avicus to go with you to Minecon, who would it be?
9. What is your nationality?
10. Do you play sports (if so, what is it) or are you a "couch potato?"

Ok...that should be enough for now.
I will ask more next year, all right?
Anyways...it is REALLY great to have you here in Avicus!
I hope we get along in the future (just like now) :P
See you in game!
Bye!

replies.body:
Why did you apply for mod? Like it so far?

Idk, I had been wanting to join the staff team for awhile. Decent experience I guess

How did you find Avicus? Why did you stay?

A group of friends came on then MCZone to mess around for abit and I joined them, but after that I kinda left it sitting around on my multiplayer list for awhile. Not sure why but I decided to play on then MCZone more and joined the community.

Opinions on Avicus?

A lot to improve on in terms of the staff team, has a good community and needs to improve a bit server-wise

Where did you learn your PvP? Sword or Bow? What team do you really want to join?

I can't remember, but most probably YouTube videos and Jozz xd. Sword. spaceman

Would you rather have the world end by AI or climate change?

climate change

Opinions on the Little Red Dot?

small but rich and powerful

Opinions on me?

A good friend that is helpful, knowledgeable, smart and good at pvp :)

replies.body:
Hey!
It's fine :))

1. What is your REAL name? Gabriel
2. How old are you now? 14
3. Are you a boy or a girl? Boy
4. Are there any opinions on me? You're very cheerful, kind and approachable, love the positive attitude, keep it up :)
5. What are your opinions on South Korea and Greece? South Korea - wonderful country, great food, nice scenery | Greece - rip economy?
6. What is your favorite color? Blue
7. What is your favorite animal? Dogs
8. If you could pick any staff member on Avicus to go with you to Minecon, who would it be? If Medias counts, then Xuph
9. What is your nationality? Singaporean
10. Do you play sports (if so, what is it) or are you a "couch potato?" I play soccer

replies.body:
1. What is your favorite animal? Dogs
  2. What do you think about the dutch people on the server and the country? Friendly and nice :) I would really like to visit netherlands next time as I heard that it's beautiful there, especially the canals there I think
  3. What do you want to be later on the Avicus? CTF, 5CP (these two will be coming soon ;) )
  4. Rate me :D 7/10
  5. Sword or bow? Sword
  6. Rate yourself at pvp 6/10
You're a nice guy but can improve in attitude. Don't worry about getting into a good team, slowly work your way up by improving yourself, you'll get to the team you desire one day, if you persevere. If you don't get something you really want, don't give up, work for it but don't go to an extent when people get annoyed by your actions. You're a good player, there's just room for improvement and I have faith in you :)

  3. What do you want to be later on the Avicus? CTF, 5CP (these two will be coming soon ;) )
  4. Rate me :D 7/10
  5. Sword or bow? Sword
  6. Rate yourself at pvp 6/10
You're a nice guy but can improve in attitude. Don't worry about getting into a good team, slowly work your way up by improving yourself, you'll get to the team you desire one day, if you persevere. If you don't get something you really want, don't give up, work for it but don't go to an extent when people get annoyed by your actions. You're a good player, there's just room for improvement and I have faith in you :)

replies.body:
Opinions on me? I don't really know you that well but you can be a little bit annoying I guess :( you seem to poke your head everywhere and might be a little reckless, but other than that, you make interesting maps and you're caring :))

Age? 14

Do you want to be a map dev? Hmm, maybe not.

replies.body:
Opinions? Great person, great memer, good at pvp and bow, great leader. You make good tournament maps and you have a wide knowledge of the competitive scene. Also, those edits are pretty dank :)
Favorite map? Rendezvous3TE, Wahiz, Supply2
Favorite position? Skybridge/Midlines/Offense
